ages.name: The Formless Era
ages.description: Only the Singulars existed, drifting in primordial chaos. No dimensions, no mortality, no structure.
keyEvents: Singulars exist in undifferentiated potential
Nolem is simply entropy — a natural force, not yet malevolent

ages.name: The Age of Separation
ages.description: Reality crystallized into infinite dimensions. Mortal beings emerged. The Aeth'kai flourished and were consumed.
keyEvents: Infinite dimensions emerge
Mortal beings appear
Aeth'kai civilization flourishes
Nolem discovers he can absorb mortal beings
Nolem consumes the entire Aeth'kai civilization
ages.endedBy: Nolem going dormant after consuming the Aeth'kai

ages.name: The Age of Silence
ages.description: Nolem slept. Dimensions developed independently. Nikes and Charles variants existed separately, unaware of each other.
keyEvents: Nolem goes dormant
Civilizations rise and fall
Cthulhu watches and waits
The pattern of Nike and Charles exists but is not yet unified

ages.name: The First Bond Era
ages.description: OG Charles stumbled through a rift, met OG Nike, and formed the bond that changed everything.
keyEvents: Nolem awakens and targets pigs across the multiverse
OG Charles stumbles through the first dimensional rift
OG Charles meets OG Nike, fleeing from Nolem
OG Charles refuses to abandon OG Nike
The First Bond forms — two souls fusing on a cosmic level
Together they resist Nolem's initial assault

ages.name: The Shattering (The Great Echo)
ages.period: A single moment that echoes eternally
ages.description: Reality fractured. The First Bond refused to break — instead, it echoed across all dimensions.
keyEvents: Reality fractures into infinite dimensions
The First Bond echoes rather than breaks
OG Nike fragments into 5,555 Nikes
OG Charles echoes into the Charles Constant
Both originals become 'templates' carrying the weight of all echoes
Nolem retreats to adapt his strategy

ages.name: The Age of Echoes
ages.description: The present day. Collectors bond with Nikes. Harbingers serve Nolem. The war for the multiverse continues.
keyEvents: The Convergence Hub established as a nexus
Collectors begin bonding with Nikes
Nolem creates Harbingers from corrupted Nikes
Dexter Hun avatars spread across dimensions
The prophecy of Nike Prime emerges
A Collector rises who may restore the First Bond

ages.name: The Coming Storm
ages.description: The final battle. Nike Prime will rise. The First Bond may be restored. A sacrifice will be required.
keyEvents: Nolem reaches full strength
Nike Prime rises (5,555 souls as one)
The First Bond is restored
A sacrifice is made
The fate of the multiverse is decided
